item.title: Education

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a first year Computer Engineering PhD student at Northwestern University advised by Prof. Simone Campanoni. My research interests are at the intersection of compilers and computer architecture, specifically for resource-constrained environments. I did my undergrad in Electrical Engineering at The College of New Jersey, where I did some research in embedded control and deep learning. Outside of the lab, I enjoy playing ice hockey, lifting weights, skiing, running and playing tennis.
